name: Reset Password
emailContent:
Reset Your Password

Hello,

We received a request to reset your password.

Reset Password

This reset link will expire in {{expire}}

If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

@ 2026 Quzee Drive. All rights reserved.

name: Order Received
emailContent:
